title._content: [Private Jacob Harker of Company C, 120th Ohio Volunteers in uniform with musket and haversack] (LOC)

description._content: [Private Jacob Harker of Company C, 120th Ohio Volunteers in uniform with musket and haversack] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff from information in collections file. Case: Berg, no. 3-98. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Harker, Jacob. United States.--Army--Ohio Infantry Regiment, 120th (1862-1864)--People. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
